specifications.title: Architecture Overview
specifications.summary: "Read me first" document for the overall architecture. Provides a summary of the reference, archetype and service models, and describes global semantics.

specifications.title: Foundation Types
specifications.summary: Specification of assumed, primitive and other foundation types required by all other openEHR specifications.

specifications.title: Base Types
specifications.summary: Specification of basic openEHR and health informatics types used in other openEHR specifications.

specifications.title: Resource
specifications.summary: The Resource specification defines a formal model of authoring and IP meta-data, language translation and annotations that can be used by classes defining any concrete type of authored resource, such as a document, archetype or template.

specifications.title: ISO 18308 Conformance Statement
specifications.summary: Document describing conformance of openEHR architecture to ISO TS 18308, "Requirements for EHR Architectures".

expressions.title: Base UML
expressions.description: UML file for openEHR Base classes, as MagicDraw 19. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.
